intro.narration: In the cold, sterile confines of a government interrogation room, you find yourself confronted with allegations of involvement in a massive bank heist. The weight of the accusations presses down on your chest as the interrogator's piercing gaze never wavers.

nodes.narration: The interrogator lays out the evidence against you, a chilling account of stolen funds and a trail that leads straight to you. Your heart races as you steel yourself for what's to come.

choices.text: Deny any involvement, claim innocence.
Admit to a minor role in the heist, offer cooperation.

nodes.narration: You vehemently deny any involvement in the heist. The interrogator's expression remains impassive as they press on, seeking to uncover inconsistencies.

choices.text: Stick to your story, refuse to back down.
Admit to a small lie, hoping to buy time.

nodes.narration: You admit to a minor role in the heist, offering cooperation. The interrogator's demeanor softens slightly as they consider your offer.

choices.text: Insist on full immunity in exchange for information.
Agree to cooperate without conditions.

nodes.narration: As the interrogation continues, you find yourself caught in a web of lies and half-truths. The pressure mounts as the stakes grow higher.

choices.text: Double down on your lies, hoping to outmaneuver them.
Confess to the full extent of your involvement, hoping for leniency.

nodes.narration: You double down on your lies, trying to outmaneuver the interrogator. They seem unphased, continuing their relentless pursuit of the truth.

choices.text: Stick to your story, refuse to back down.

nodes.narration: You confess to the full extent of your involvement, hoping for leniency. The interrogator's expression remains unreadable as they process your confession.

choices.text: Apologize sincerely, express remorse.
Attempt to justify your actions, minimize your role.

nodes.narration: As the interrogation reaches its climax, you find yourself at a crossroads. The consequences of your actions loom large, and the stakes have never been higher.

choices.text: Stand firm in your lies, refusing to back down.

choices.text: Prepare for the worst, bracing yourself for the fallout.

endings.title: A Chance at Redemption
endings.narration: Despite your involvement in the bank heist, your honesty and cooperation lead to a lenient sentence. You're given a second chance, a beacon of hope amidst the darkness.

endings.title: The Fallout
endings.narration: Your lies and deceit catch up to you. The consequences of your actions are severe, leaving you to face the fallout head-on.

endings.title: The Twist
endings.narration: As the interrogation concludes, it's revealed that you were being manipulated all along. The stakes were higher than you ever imagined, and the truth is far more complex.
